languages.text: {n}Лица высших офицеров светятся неподдельным счастьем. Собрание возглавляет Абеляр, выглядящий усталым и слегка постаревшим.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, офицеры корабля восторженно приветствуют вас! Экипаж возносит молитвы, благодаря Императора за ваше счастливое возвращение!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Лица высших офицеров светятся неподдельным счастье. Собрание возглавляет Абеляр, выглядящий усталым и слегка постаревшим.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, офицеры корабля восторженно приветствуют вас! Экипаж возносит молитвы, благодаря Императора за ваше счастливое возвращение!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Abelard, who presides over the gathering, looks tired and a little older.{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship's officers gladly welcome you back! The crew offers prayers of thanks to the Emperor for your safe return!"
languages.original_text: {n}Лица высших офицеров светятся неподдельным счастьем. Собрание возглавляет Абеляр, выглядящий усталым и слегка постаревшим.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, офицеры корабля восторженно приветствуют вас! Экипаж возносит молитвы, благодаря Императора за ваше счастливое возвращение!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The high-ranking officers are beaming with genuine joy. Abelard, who presides over the gathering, looks tired and a little older.{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship's officers are elated to welcome you back! The crew offers thankful prayers to the Emperor for your safe return!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The high-ranking officers are beaming with genuine joy. Abelard, who presides over the gathering, looks tired and a little older.{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship's officers are elated to welcome you back! The crew offers thankful prayers to the Emperor for your safe return!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Abelard, who presides over the gathering, looks tired and a little older.{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship's officers gladly welcome you back! The crew offers prayers of thanks to the Emperor for your safe return!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Abelard, who presides over the gathering, looks tired and a little older.{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship's officers gladly welcome you back! The crew offers prayers of thanks to the Emperor for your safe return!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Abelard, who presides over the gathering, looks tired and a little older.{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship's officers gladly welcome you back! The crew offers prayers of thanks to the Emperor for your safe return!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Abelard, who presides over the gathering, looks tired and a little older.{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship's officers gladly welcome you back! The crew offers prayers of thanks to the Emperor for your safe return!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los altos mandos rebosan de genuina felicidad. Abelard, que preside a los oficiales congregados, parece cansado y un poco más viejo.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán, los oficiales del navío le damos una calurosa bienvenida! ¡La tripulación ora al Emperador en agradecimiento por haberle traído de vuelta sano y salvo!».
languages.original_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Abelard, who presides over the gathering, looks tired and a little older.{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship's officers gladly welcome you back! The crew offers prayers of thanks to the Emperor for your safe return!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los altos mandos rebosan de genuina felicidad. Abelard, que preside a los oficiales congregados, parece cansado y un poco más viejo.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán, los oficiales del navío le damos una calurosa bienvenida! ¡La tripulación ora al Emperador en agradecimiento por haberle traído de vuelta sano y salvo!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}所有高级军官露出了发自内心的喜悦笑容。负责主持会议的阿贝拉德看起来很疲惫，像是又年迈了几岁。{/n}“舰长大人，船上的军官很高兴欢迎您归来！全体船员向帝皇衷心祈祷，感谢祂庇佑您安全归来。”
languages.original_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Abelard, who presides over the gathering, looks tired and a little older.{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship's officers gladly welcome you back! The crew offers prayers of thanks to the Emperor for your safe return!"

traits.locale_text: {n}所有高级军官露出了发自内心的喜悦笑容。负责主持会议的阿贝拉德看起来很疲惫，像是又年迈了几岁。{/n}“舰长大人，船上的军官很高兴欢迎您归来！全体船员向帝皇衷心祈祷，感谢祂庇佑您安全归来。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Clairement heureux, les officiers supérieurs sourient de toutes leurs dents. Abélard, qui préside l'assemblée, semble fatigué et avoir pris de l'âge.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les officiers du vaisseau sont ravis de vous revoir à bord ! Tout l'équipage remercie l'Empereur pour votre retour ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Abelard, who presides over the gathering, looks tired and a little older.{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship's officers gladly welcome you back! The crew offers prayers of thanks to the Emperor for your safe return!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clairement heureux, les officiers supérieurs sourient de toutes leurs dents. Abélard, qui préside l'assemblée, semble fatigué et avoir pris de l'âge.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les officiers du vaisseau sont ravis de vous revoir à bord ! Tout l'équipage remercie l'Empereur pour votre retour ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}上級将校たちは心から喜んで顔をほころばせる。その場を取り仕切るアベラルドも、少し老けて疲れているように見えた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、当艦の士官たちは喜んで陛下のお帰りを歓迎いたします！乗組員一同、ご無事の帰還を皇帝に感謝の祈りを捧げましょう！」
languages.original_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Abelard, who presides over the gathering, looks tired and a little older.{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship's officers gladly welcome you back! The crew offers prayers of thanks to the Emperor for your safe return!"

traits.locale_text: {n}上級将校たちは心から喜んで顔をほころばせる。その場を取り仕切るアベラルドも、少し老けて疲れているように見えた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、当艦の士官たちは喜んで陛下のお帰りを歓迎いたします！乗組員一同、ご無事の帰還を皇帝に感謝の祈りを捧げましょう！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die hochrangigen Offiziere strahlen vor ehrlichem Glück. Abelard, der die Versammlung anführt, sieht erschöpft und etwas älter aus.{/n} "Lord Captain, die Offiziere des Schiffs heißen Euch freudig willkommen zurück an Bord! Die Crew dankt dem Imperator für Eure unbeschadete Rückkehr!"
languages.original_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Abelard, who presides over the gathering, looks tired and a little older.{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship's officers gladly welcome you back! The crew offers prayers of thanks to the Emperor for your safe return!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die hochrangigen Offiziere strahlen vor ehrlichem Glück. Abelard, der die Versammlung anführt, sieht erschöpft und etwas älter aus.{/n} "Lord Captain, die Offiziere des Schiffs heißen Euch freudig willkommen zurück an Bord! Die Crew dankt dem Imperator für Eure unbeschadete Rückkehr!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yüksek rütbeli subaylar, saf bir mutlulukla havalara uçuyor. Toplantıyı yöneten Abelard, yorgun ve yaşlanmış gözüküyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, gemi subayları sizi karşılamaktan memnuniyet duyar! Mürettebat subayları, sapasağlam döndüğünüz için İmparator'a müteşekkir!"
languages.original_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Abelard, who presides over the gathering, looks tired and a little older.{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship's officers gladly welcome you back! The crew offers prayers of thanks to the Emperor for your safe return!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüksek rütbeli subaylar saf bir mutlulukla havalara uçuyor. Toplantıyı yöneten Abelard, yorgun ve yaşlanmış gözüküyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, gemi subayları sizi memnuniyetle karşılıyor! Mürettebat subayları, güvenle geri döndüğünüz için İmparator'a müteşekkir!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.translation_comment:
Если не брали Абеляра в Прорву
Все аплодируют
